```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r logo, out.width="50%", fig.align='center'}
img <- png::readPNG("../../images/flipr_hex_trans.png")
g <- grid::rasterGrob(img, interpolate = TRUE)
ggplot() +
  annotation_custom(g, xmin = -Inf, xmax = Inf, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf) + 
  theme_void()
```

Version 0.2.1 of the [**flipr**](https://astamm.github.io/flipr/) package has been released on [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/flipr/index.html).
